title: Collaborative Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for Introduction to Computer Science

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental programming concepts and quantitative reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Foundational computer science training for working professionals developing job-integrated projects

learning_goals: Learners can explain the algorithm design and implementation process with 80% accuracy through collaborative learning activities.
Learners enhance problem-solving skills by performing team-based coding tasks in a mobile environment.
Learners demonstrate software development competencies applicable to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
